dialogues.speaker: cat
text: I'm thinking of writing a novel. What genre do you think would be good?
제가 소설을 쓰려고 하는데 어떤 장르가 좋겠습니까?
A novel with thrilling plot twists and turns, like a mystery novel!
역시 소설은 심장쫄깃 반전 가득한 추리소설이죠!
A heartwarming romance novel that makes your heart flutter!
An imaginative fantasy novel where your creativity knows no bounds!
역시 소설은 상상력을 마음껏 펼칠 수 있는 판타지소설이죠!

dialogues.speaker: cat
answer: A mystery novel... I'll create a twist you can't even imagine.
추리소설이라...상상도 못 하실 반전을 한번 만들어보겠습니다.
A romance novel... Just thinking about it makes my heart race.
A fantasy novel... How about a story about a cat magical school?
